text: Belize was first at the Olympic Games in 1968. They have been in every Summer Olympic Games since then, except the boycotted 1980 Summer Olympics. The nation has been in the Winter Olympic Games on three occasions in 2010, 2014 and 2018 but it yet to appear since then. From 1968 to 1972, Belize was known by its colonial name of British Honduras. As of 2011, no athlete from Belize has ever won an Olympic medal. The National Olympic Committee for Belize was formed in 1967 and recognized by the International Olympic Committee that same year. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== == Other websites == * Belize profile at London2012.com * Belize at Olympics.org Category:Sport in Belize Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Belize at the Olympics
